Text: Thanks. A great intro to film-making.

I can't believe how much info is packed into every minute of this DVD in easy to understand language. The best info on how and what is being done in a movie and how it effects the viewer, that I have ever come across. So much info on film making is pure BS, but this is the real deal.  A gold mine.

Hey, thanks a million for this. Could you please upload DVD2? I really need it for a college course I'm taking. I would really appreciate it!
Awesome torrent, love you!
